text:
Suryavamsam () () is an 2020 Indian Tamil-language family drama which currently airing on Zee Tamil and it stars Nikitha Rajesh and Aashish Chakravarthi with Poornima Bhagyaraj in the lead roles. While Anitha Venkat, Caroline, Birla Bose, Gajesh, Ramachandran plays supporting roles.
This series started from 27 September 2020 on Monday to Saturday at 7:00PM (IST) time slot. The story is mainly about the relationship among Family.
Plot.
Kalyani's (Sandhana) family disowns her after she gets married to a foreigner without their approval. Years later, Kalyani falls sick, so her daughter Samantha "Sam" (Nikitha Rajesh) decides to reunite the family.
Remake.
This series story was taken from Zee Telugu serial "America Ammayi".
International broadcast.
The series was released on 21 September 2020 on Zee Tamil and Zee Tamil HD. The show was also broadcast internationally on the network's international channels.
